rules.description: CTRL: Change caps_lock key to CTRL. Send escape when pressed alone [300ms]
Hyper layer: Change ctrl key to hyper (command+control+shift). Send nothing when pressed alone
SpaceFN layer: navigation right hand (IJKL arrows, H=pgup, N=pgdown, M=home ,=end)
Mouse button4 to back (all mouse. Must enable Device)
